alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 6
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 6 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements and features.

Here’s what’s new:

  • TweetDeck Theme Syncing (if you change the theme on Tweeten, it will change your theme for your TweetDeck account, too).
  • New design for Update dialog
  • Other improvements

Any suggestion or any bug? Please report them to us in the Slack Team #bug/#feedback channel

Oh, and welcome aboard!
